Title: The Sacred Taking
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Ryan Murphy
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Taissa Farmiga, Frances Conroy, Evan Peters
Plot: With Fiona struggling to cope with the effects of her medication, the rest of the coven undertake a ritual known as the "sacred taking" to prepare for the next supreme. However Fiona must take her own life if the ritual is to be a success.
